  • Constructor Details

    • Connector

      public Connector​(int energy, Coordinates coordinates, int cooldown)
      Constructor of the Connector class
      Parameters:
      energy - ammount of energy that the Connector has
      coordinates - geographic position of the Connector
      cooldown - time in minutes of the charging cooldown

  • Method Details

      the Connector's cooldown

    • setCooldown

      public void setCooldown​(int cooldown)
      Setter for cooldown
      Parameters:
      cooldown - time in minutes for the connector's cooldown

    • getLastInteraction

      public PlayerInteraction getLastInteraction()
      Getter for the players that interacted with this Connector
      Returns:
      list of PlayerInteraction

    • chargePlayer

      public boolean chargePlayer​(Player player)
      Charges a Player with the ammount of energy that the Connector can provide. First it checks wether a PlayerInteraction for the Player already exists. If so, it notifies the user of the remaining cooldown before being able to charge again. If it doesn't exist, it charges the player and adds a new PlayerInteraction to the list.
      Parameters:
      player - Player to be charged
      Returns:
      true if charged; false if not charged

    • addPlayerInteraction

      public boolean addPlayerInteraction​(GameMap map)
      Adds a new PlayerInteraction to the list
      Parameters:
      map - GameMap instance, for checking existing players
      Returns:
      true if added; false if not added

    • removePlayerInteraction

      public boolean removePlayerInteraction()
      Removes a PlayerInteraction from the list
      Returns:
      true if removed; false if not removed

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Lists all information about the Connector
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      String with the information

    • compareByCooldown

      public int compareByCooldown​(Connector other)
      Compares connectors by their cooldown time
      Parameters:
      other - Connector to be compared to
      Returns:
      '-1' if lesser; '0' if equal; '1' if greater
